query_crtd_table_entity: SELECT * FROM CRTD_{0} ORDER BY CREATED_DATETIME DESC LIMIT {1};
query_stg_table_entity: select hierarchylevelidentifier from STG_{0} ORDER BY CREATED_DATETIME DESC LIMIT {1};
query_crtd_table_item_locations: SELECT ITEM_LOC.ITEM,ITEM_LOC.LOCATION, LOC.LOCATIONTYPECODE FROM CRTD_ITEM_LOCATION AS ITEM_LOC JOIN CRTD_LOCATION AS LOC ON ITEM_LOC.LOCATION = LOC.LOCATION WHERE LOC.LOCATIONTYPECODE IN ('STORE', 'DISTRIBUTION_CENTER') AND ITEM_LOC.ITEM IN ({0});
